content.raw:
I included the `harness_status` in the Status box, as an integer. Please note that the [Monitor SRC ihmc controller and harness status PR](#!/osrf/cloudsim-sim/pull-requests/67/monitor-src-ihmc-controller-and-harness/diff) should be merged first, as this PR depends on it.

This is available for review now.

ptal @andres_fortier , @preyna

Screenshot - Note that I commented the Practice Mode box so it would look like the finals. The missing status parameters were hardcoded in it.

![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1496840571919.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/148758665-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1496840571919.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-1496840571919.png')
